entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Winterland Branch Hill 11:30 PM NST Saturday 04 February 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 99.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -19
Dewpoint: -8.2°C
Wind: 64 km/h gust 78 km/h

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries or snow squalls ending after midnight then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm except locally 10 cm in snow squalls. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 over exposed areas after midnight. Wind becoming northwest 50 gusting to 70 overnight. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. Wind chill minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 11:40 PM NST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning in the morning and ending late in the afternoon. Risk of snow squalls in the afternoon. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 11:40 PM NST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow or rain. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning late in the evening then changing to rain overnight. Blowing snow over exposed areas late in the evening and after midnight. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 overnight. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening. Forecast issued 11:40 PM NST Saturday 04 February 2023
